dialog.text: Ah!!!!!  Tanya was so mean to me. Do you know what she said to me?

joins.text: But I didn't tell you the whole story!
Well, you'll never guess what happened!

dialog.text: She said I hadn't done anything useful the entire term!  I lost my rag completely and called her a stuck up so and so - luckily the recording wasn't on! I wish we had been on a team so far instead of with Tanya, don't you?

joins.text: Hopefully we will be on the next one!
Ah, shucks, I feel so wanted 😃

dialog.text: I had to ring my Mum today and told her what Tanya said.  It was so good to hear a friendly voice.  Pete was so mean to me last night saying I was ignoring him and I never spend any time with him now - my life is so shit at the moment!  Anyway I won't bore you with my troubles, I'd better be off - catch you later!
